title: The Mammoth Book of Steampunk
description: The Mammoth Book of Steampunk showcases the very best in the form of stories by Paul Di Filippo, Neil Gaiman, Cherie Priest, and many more.An anthology that looks to the future through the lens of the past, these 30 mash-ups of past and future push the boundaries of steampunk.This is steampunk with a modern, post-colonial sensibility.
